Summary: Five witnesses. Two orangeish redish glowing orbs following same path one after another then vanishing no noise
divs: Sighting DetailsMarty may have been talking and said he saw something. Then I lookedcand saw an ornate glow and stood up looking out the screen. Other three walked out of screen patio before me. We watched in disbelief.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Sarasota
There were no other sightings in Sarasota on or around September 4th 2011
